no.uib.prideconverter
Class PRIDEConverter

java.lang.Object
  no.uib.prideconverter.PRIDEConverter

public class PRIDEConverter
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains the code for the actual conversion. Is works as the supervisor of all the wizard frames.

Constructor Detail

PRIDEConverter

public PRIDEConverter()
Creates a new instance of PRIDEConverter. Opens the first frame of the wizard (Data Source Selection).

Method Detail

connectToDataBase

public boolean connectToDataBase(DataBaseDetails dataBaseDetails)
Tries to connect to the ms_lims database.

Parameters:
dataBaseDetails - a reference to the database details frame
Returns:
true if connected, false otherwise

closeDataBaseConnection

public void closeDataBaseConnection()
Closes the database connection

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Tries to set the look and feel to PlasticLookAndFeel. Then checks if an ErrorLog is created, if not, it is created. And finally starts the PRIDEConverter wizard. Also checks if a newer version of the PRIDE Converter is available.

Parameters:
args - the command line arguments

cancelConvertion

public void cancelConvertion()
Cancels the convertion process by System.exit(0). First saves the user properties.

convert

public void convert(OutputDetails outputDetails)
Tries to convert the selected file(s) into PRIDE XML

Parameters:
outputDetails - a reference to the OutputDetails frame.
